Package org.opends.guitools.controlpanel

Class ControlPanelArgumentParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ArgumentParser
      • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ControlPanelArgumentParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolRefDocContainer
    public class ControlPanelArgumentParser
extends ArgumentParser
    Class used to parse the arguments of the control panel command-line.

        public int getExplicitPort()

      • getBindPassword

        public String getBindPassword()
        Get the password which has to be used for the command without prompting the user. If no password was specified, return null.
        Returns:
        The password stored into the specified file on by the command line argument, or null if not specified.

      • isTrustAll

        public boolean isTrustAll()
        Returns whether the user specified to trust all certificates or not.
        Returns:
        whether the user specified to trust all certificates or not.

      • getConnectTimeout

        public int getConnectTimeout()
                      throws IllegalStateException
        Returns the timeout to be used to connect in milliseconds. The method must be called after parsing the arguments.
        Returns:
        the timeout to be used to connect in milliseconds. Returns 0 if there is no timeout.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the method is called before parsing the arguments.

      • isRemote

        public boolean isRemote()
        Returns whether the user specified to connect to a remote server.

        whether the user specified to connect to a remote server.
